headline: Bitcoin price to hit $180,000 if it overcomes this hurdle, analyst says
summary: The threat of quantum computing is “cloud in the air,” said Eliezer Ndinga of 21Shares. Unless developers do something about the vulnerability, Bitcoin will remain in its current price range. Timelines surrounding the potential threat are uncertain.

headline: Rising Dividend, Fed Speculation and Tech Push Might Change The Case For Investing In BlackRock (BLK)
summary: BlackRock reported full-year 2025 revenue of US$24.22 billion and net income of US$5.55 billion, while also lifting its quarterly dividend to US$5.73 per share payable on March 24, 2026. At the same time, speculation over BlackRock executive Rick Rieder as a leading candidate for Federal Reserve Chair and the firm’s prominent advocacy for blockchain tokenization and AI at Davos underscored its influence at the intersection of monetary policy and financial technology. We’ll now examine how...
